verbs.description: Arpaio [V: was] pardoned by President Donald Trump after being found in contempt of a court order banning him from targeting immigrants without reasonable suspicion .

Arpaio was pardoned by President Donald Trump after [V: being] found in contempt of a court order banning him from targeting immigrants without reasonable suspicion .

Arpaio was pardoned by President Donald Trump after being found in contempt of [ARG0: a court order] [V: banning] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: from targeting immigrants without reasonable suspicion] .
